Whether languages should be closed autom: Whether languages should be closed automatically upon completion. Default is true
Whether the task should be automatically: Whether the task should be automatically closed upon all language completion. Default is true
Comma-separated tags to be added to keys: Comma-separated tags to be added to keys when task is closed
If set to true, will lock translations f: If set to true, will lock translations for non-assigned project members
Mark translations as verified. Only for: Mark translations as verified. Only for automatic_translation tasks. Default is true
Save AI translations to Translation Memo: Save AI translations to Translation Memory. Only for automatic_translation tasks
Apply 100% translation memory matches. O: Apply 100% translation memory matches. Only for automatic_translation tasks

Whether this key is hidden from non-admi: Whether this key is hidden from non-admins

Maximum allowed number of characters in: Maximum allowed number of characters in translations
The actual translation content. Use JSON: The actual translation content. Use JSON object format for plural keys
Whether the Unverified flag is enabled: Whether the Unverified flag is enabled
Whether the Reviewed flag is enabled: Whether the Reviewed flag is enabled
